resources.string: Love is friendship set to music
Music is love in search of a word
Love is like the wind, you can\'t see it but you can feel it.
Music doesn\'t lie. if there is something to be changed in this world, then it can only happen through music.
With the night Music, you either forget everything or you remember everything.
Music is able to impact the ethical side of the soul. And again the music has such properties that, obviously, it should be included in an education process of youth.
Unable to download file without Write Storage permission.
You need to allow Storage access in the phone setting
